titles.title: Third Sunday of Easter Year B Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Lift up the light of your face on us, O Lord.

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Know that the LORD works
wonders for his faithful one;
the LORD will hear me
whenever i call him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
"What can bring us happiness?"
many say.
Lift up the light of
your face on us, O LORD.

verse.name: v4
